Hi, I'm Brenden. I am an epidemiologist, community researcher, and R enthusiast. I am passionate about health equity, harm reduction, and community engagement.

If you would like to see some of my current and past work, you can visit my [portfolio page](projects.qmd) or check out [my blog](blog.qmd).
